sense.gloss: to perform anal sex (between men), to bugger, to sodomize, to sodomise
to crash a car into the back of another, to rear-end
effeminate gay man, male transvestite, (preoperative) transgender woman, (gay) male prostitute
first tea ceremony of New Year

sdata.j: きのう↑交差点↑↓こうさてん↓でお↑釜↑↓がま↓を↑掘↑↓ほ↓られちゃったよ。
sdata.e: Someone ploughed into me from behind at an intersection yesterday.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は、↑新居↑↓しんきょ↓へ↑移↑↓うつ↓ると↑共↑↓とも↓に、↑私↑↓わたし↓の↑部屋↑↓へや↓へ↑引↑↓ひ↓っ↑込↑↓こ↓んで、↑自分↑↓じぶん↓で↑炊事↑↓すいじ↓できるだけの↑道具↑↓どうぐ↓ーー↑土釜↑↓どがま↓、↑土鍋↑↓どなべ↓、↑七輪↑↓しちりん↓の↑類↑↓るい↓をととのえた。
sdata.e: When I moved into my new home, I just brought with me the things that I needed for cooking, an earthen rice cooker, an earthenware pot and an earthen charcoal brazier.

sdata.j: あの↑店↑↓みせ↓の↑釜↑↓かま↓めしは↑絶品↑↓ぜっぴん↓だよ。
sdata.e: That restaurant's kamameshi is absolutely superb.
